text: Hyde Park is a town in and the shire townTitle 24, Part I, Chapter 1, ยง9, Vermont Statutes. Accessed 2007-11-01. (county seat) of Lamoille County, Vermont, United States. The population was 3,020 at the 2020 census. There is also a village of the same name within the town. ==References== Category:Towns in Vermont Category:County seats in Vermont
title: Hyde Park (town), Vermont
